entries.title: Monthly Bulletin | Central Bank of Sri Lanka
entries.text: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka Bulletin is issued monthly by the Department of Economic Research under the direction of a Staff Editorial Committee.

entries.text: Laws and Regulations. 1. Central Bank of Sri Lanka Act, No. 16 of 2023. An act to provide for the establishment of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka; ...

entries.title: Monetary Policy Instruments and Implementation
entries.text: The main monetary policy instruments used currently are Overnight Policy Rate (OPR), Open Market Operations (OMO), Standing Facilities and the Statutory Reserve ...

entries.title: Policy Rates | Central Bank of Sri Lanka
entries.text: Overnight Policy Rate (OPR) is the policy interest rate of the Central Bank under the single policy interest rate mechanism (wef 27 November 2024).
